East_Orange.North Arlington School District:
The North Arlington School District is a comprehensive community public school district that serves students in pre-kindergarten through twelfth grade from North Arlington in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its five schools had an enrollment of 1,769 students and 129.9 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 13.6:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "DE", the fifth-highest of eight groupings.
